Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text:
I think it is vey authentic Indonesian food in this neighborhood.
Their food is pre-made thought. Which mean, they already cook everything before hand. After you order, they will put your food in the microwave. …

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Absolutely incredible Indonesian food with great set menu options which allow you to try many different dishes on the same plate. The chicken stay & sauce is not to be missed too. Amazing value for money

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Amazing food for a good price!

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Best Indonesian food I’ve had in Amsterdam! Great people and great quality of food, would definitely recommend this to anyone!

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Best Indonesian takeaway in the riviera! Great Rames menus and superior Tahoe selection

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Great taste, friendly personnel. Really recommend this.

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Very good Indonesian selection. Personally I like to take a base menu and boost it with extra things and get two solid and varied meals from one order. …

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Great Indonesian food at a very good price. A great variety of vegetarian and meat dishes, also with a large selection of sides. The staff are also really welcoming and friendly.

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Great food. But the portions are getting smaller and smaller. A €9,50 meal (Nasi Rames Special) does not feed me. I am a customer from the first hour, but afraid that is ending now.

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Tasty food and nice service, I recommend this restaurant for those who want to try Indonesian food or who are already familiar with Indonesian taste. Not spicy menu is also available for those who has an aversion towards spiciness.

Name: Waroeng Bamboe
Review Text: Amazing food, totally unique.
